cache_responses.who is faruk: Faruk Hasan is a Senior Software QA Engineer at Digital.ai with 5+ years of experience in automation testing, CI/CD, and cloud infrastructure. He's also an educator who teaches coding and AI courses.
cache_responses.what does faruk do: Faruk works as a Senior Software QA Engineer specializing in Playwright automation testing. He also teaches Python, AI, and web development courses on Udemy and provides tutoring services.
cache_responses.faruk experience: Faruk has 5+ years of QA engineering experience, currently working at Digital.ai since 2022. He previously worked at M.M.Hayes Co and specializes in Playwright, Python, and test automation frameworks.
cache_responses.contact faruk: You can contact Faruk at faruqmul@gmail.com. He's also available on LinkedIn at linkedin.com/in/md-faruk-hasan/
cache_responses.how can i contact faruk: You can contact Faruk at faruqmul@gmail.com. He's also available on LinkedIn at linkedin.com/in/md-faruk-hasan/
cache_responses.how to contact faruk: You can contact Faruk at faruqmul@gmail.com. He's also available on LinkedIn at linkedin.com/in/md-faruk-hasan/
cache_responses.tutoring: Faruk offers personalized tutoring in Python, web development, AI/ML, and test automation. He has taught 2000+ students with a 4.82/5 rating. Contact him at faruqmul@gmail.com for tutoring inquiries.
cache_responses.courses: Faruk has created courses on Udemy including 'Python Fundamentals: Fun and Practical Projects for Beginners' and 'AI & Machine Learning for Beginners'. Both are highly rated by students.
cache_responses.python course: Faruk's Python Fundamentals course on Udemy focuses on practical projects for beginners. Students love its hands-on approach and clear explanations.
cache_responses.ai course: Faruk's AI & Machine Learning for Beginners course on Udemy provides an accessible introduction to AI concepts with hands-on projects for beginners.
cache_responses.playwright: Faruk is an expert in Playwright automation testing with Python and TypeScript. He's built advanced frameworks with CI/CD integration and has created browser extensions for test result visualization.
cache_responses.automation testing: Faruk specializes in automation testing using Playwright, Selenium, and custom frameworks. He's reduced regression cycle times by 50% and improved test coverage significantly.
cache_responses.python: Faruk is proficient in Python for test automation, web development, and AI/ML projects. He teaches Python fundamentals and has built several automation frameworks.
cache_responses.ai ml: Faruk has experience with AI and machine learning, including creating personalized chatbots using Ollama and Hugging Face. He teaches AI/ML concepts to beginners.
cache_responses.github: You can find Faruk's projects on GitHub at github.com/faruklmu17, including his Playwright frameworks and automation tools.
cache_responses.selenium: Faruk has extensive experience with Selenium automation testing. He's developed Selenium-based frameworks that boosted test efficiency by 30% and trained junior QA engineers.
cache_responses.digital.ai: Faruk currently works as a Senior Software QA Engineer at Digital.ai since 2022, where he designs Playwright test scripts and leads cross-functional testing initiatives.
cache_responses.teaching: Faruk has taught 2000+ students over 12+ years with a 4.82/5 rating. He creates courses on Python, AI/ML, and provides personalized tutoring services.
cache_responses.udemy: Faruk has published multiple courses on Udemy including Python Fundamentals and AI & Machine Learning for Beginners, both receiving excellent student reviews.
cache_responses.typescript: Faruk works with TypeScript for Playwright automation testing and has created browser extensions using TypeScript for test result visualization.
cache_responses.ci cd: Faruk has extensive experience with CI/CD pipelines, integrating GitHub Actions for automated test execution and improving defect identification speed.
cache_responses.hello: Hello! I'm Faruk's AI assistant. I can help you learn about his QA career, tutoring services, courses, or answer questions about Python, testing, and AI.
cache_responses.help: I can help you with information about Faruk's background, his tutoring services, technical courses, or answer questions about Python, automation testing, AI, and web development.
cache_responses.linkedin: You can connect with Faruk on LinkedIn at linkedin.com/in/md-faruk-hasan/ to learn more about his professional background and network.
cache_responses.youtube: Faruk has a YouTube channel @kidz_code where he shares educational content about programming and technology.
cache_responses.schedule: For tutoring schedules and availability, please contact Faruk directly at faruqmul@gmail.com to discuss your specific needs and time preferences.
cache_responses.pricing: For tutoring rates and course pricing information, please contact Faruk at faruqmul@gmail.com for personalized quotes based on your learning goals.
cache_responses.beginner: Faruk specializes in teaching beginners! His courses and tutoring are designed to make complex topics like Python, AI, and testing accessible to newcomers.
cache_responses.portfolio: You can view Faruk's complete portfolio and projects on his website, including his automation frameworks, courses, and professional experience.
